text: Nnaemeka Alfred Achebe, CFR (born 14 May 1941), popularly called Agbogidi is a Nigerian traditional ruler who serves as the 21st and current Obi of Onitsha, a city in Anambra State since 2002.https://obiofonitsha.com/ His Majesty Nnaemeka A. Achebe OBI OF ONITSHA (CFR, MNI) As an Academian, Achebe became the chancellor of Ahmadu Bello University since 2015 after previously being the chancellor of Kogi State University. ==Career== Achebe had worked as the chairman of the board of Directors of Unilever Nigeria until his retirement in 2023. He was also the chairman of International Breweries, Nigeria, Director of Royal Dutch Shell Group and others. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:People from Anambra State
title: Alfred Achebe
